trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands used to reconcile changes made to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> with the associated database.
trans-unit.target: Gera automaticamente os comandos de tabela única usados para reconciliar as alterações feitas em um <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> com o banco de dados associado.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Esse tipo foi substituído e será removido em uma versão futura do .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Oracle e ADO.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> associated with the database.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>não gera automaticamente as instruções SQL necessárias para reconciliar as alterações feitas em um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>associado com o banco de dados.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create an OracleCommandBuilder object that generates SQL statements for single-table updates by setting the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode criar um objeto de OracleCommandBuilder que gera instruções SQL para atualizações de tabela única, definindo a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, the OracleCommandBuilder generates any additional SQL statements that you do not set.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o OracleCommandBuilder gera qualquer instrução SQL adicional que você não definir.

trans-unit.source: The relationship between an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and its corresponding OracleCommandBuilder is always one-to-one.
trans-unit.target: A relação entre um <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>e seu OracleCommandBuilder correspondente é sempre um para um.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: To create this correspondence, you set the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> property of the OracleCommandBuilder object.
trans-unit.target: Para criar essa correspondência, você deve definir o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>propriedade do objeto OracleCommandBuilder.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: This causes the OracleCommandBuilder to register itself as a listener, which produces the output of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that affect the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: Isso faz com que o OracleCommandBuilder ao se registrar como um ouvinte, que gera a saída de <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos que afetam o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the OracleCommandBuilder uses the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar instruções INSERT, UPDATE ou DELETE, o OracleCommandBuilder usa o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade para recuperar um conjunto necessário de metadados.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OracleCommandBuilder also uses the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O OracleCommandBuilder também usa o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>e as <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A>Propriedades referenciadas por <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Dispose%2A>, the OracleCommandBuilder is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Se você chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Dispose%2A>, o OracleCommandBuilder seja desassociado do <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>, e os comandos gerados não são mais usados.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>especificado nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>associado a esta <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>é liberado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref> class with the associated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe com associada <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>especificado nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>associado a esta <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>é liberado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object to associate with this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto para associar a este <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém o <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"> </xref> para uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a string used as the catalog separator for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém uma cadeia de caracteres usada como o separador de catálogo para uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the catalog separator for use with an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que indica o separador de catálogo para uso com uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object for which this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref> object will generate SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto para o qual o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref> objeto irá gerar instruções SQL.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>especificado nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>associado a esta <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>é liberado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"></xref> object that is associated with this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto que está associado com esta <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> and populates the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*> collection of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera informações de parâmetro do procedimento armazenado especificado no <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> e preenche o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>coleção especificada <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters overwrites any existing parameter information for the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters substitui quaisquer informações de parâmetro existentes para <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters requires an extra call to the database to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters requer uma chamada adicional para o banco de dados para obter as informações.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Se as informações de parâmetro são conhecidas antecipadamente, é mais eficiente para preencher a coleção de parâmetros definindo explicitamente as informações.

trans-unit.source: You can only use DeriveParameters with stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Você só pode usar DeriveParameters com procedimentos armazenados.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use DeriveParameters to populate the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection> with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode usar DeriveParameters para preencher o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection>com arbitrárias instruções Transact-SQL, como uma instrução SELECT com parâmetros.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Configurando parâmetros e tipos de dados do parâmetro](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> referenciando o procedimento armazenado do qual as informações de parâmetro são derivada.

trans-unit.source: The derived parameters are added to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*> collection of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros derivados são adicionados para o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>coleção do <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref> specified was not <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O texto do comando não é um nome válido de procedimento armazenado, ou o <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"> </xref> especificado não estava <xref href="System.Data.CommandType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões no banco de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetDeleteCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o método GetDeleteCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetDeleteCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetDeleteCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetDeleteCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetDeleteCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetDeleteCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetDeleteCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões no banco de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>como a base de um comando modificado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>e modifique o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>ao gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas: - o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>for especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If true, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se true, gere nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If false, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se for false, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar as inserções no banco de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetInsertCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o método GetInsertCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetInsertCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetInsertCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetInsertCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetInsertCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetInsertCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetInsertCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar as inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar as inserções no banco de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>como a base de um comando modificado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>e modifique o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite forçar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>ao gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas: - o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>for especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If true, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se true, gere nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If false, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se for false, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar as inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar atualizações no banco de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can use the GetUpdateCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o método GetUpdateCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetUpdateCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetUpdateCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetUpdateCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetUpdateCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetUpdateCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetUpdateCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para executar atualizações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates on the database.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>e modifique o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.CommandText%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.target: Se true, gere nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If false, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se for false, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para executar atualizações.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier, including properly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador sem aspas no caso de catálogo correto, retorna corretas entre aspas a forma de identificador, incluindo corretamente escape quaisquer aspas inseridas no identificador.

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador sem aspas original.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A versão entre aspas do identificador.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are properly escaped.
trans-unit.target: As aspas inseridas dentro do identificador são caracteres de escape.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caractere a ser usado para o separador entre o identificador do esquema e de quaisquer outros identificadores.

trans-unit.source: Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, servidores de banco de dados indicam que o esquema para um identificador, separando o nome do esquema de identificador com alguns caracteres.

trans-unit.source: For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as Person:CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o SQL Server usa um vírgula, criando identificadores completos como pessoa: CustomerName, onde "Pessoa" é o nome do esquema e "CustomerName" é o identificador.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade permite que desenvolvedores modificar esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The character to be used as the schema separator.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser usado como separador de esquema.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including properly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador entre aspas, retorna a forma sem aspas correta de identificador, incluindo corretamente sem escape quaisquer aspas inseridas no identificador de.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: O identificador que terá seus removidas as aspas inseridas.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly un-escaped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador sem aspas, com aspas inseridas corretamente sem escape.
